alert.note: Alert for Baxter (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Baxter County through 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fawn Park, or 8 miles north of Mountain Home, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Gassville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Fawn Park... Colfax... Ozark Regional Airport... Diamond Bay... Midway in Baxter County... Clarkridge... Robinson Point Landing... Norfork Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
